elements.text:
You're on a date at a coffee shop with a person you really like. As you walk back to the table, you trip and fall and spill coffee everywhere.

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

text: I wish I'd been a bit more careful, but I'm human and it happens.
This has probably happened to a lot of people.
My date might think I'm a bit clumsy, but they probably don't really care.
I look like a total klutz in front of my date.
This will be a great icebreaker when I start talking to my date!
